sections.title: Harvester Tiller (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Harvester Tiller class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Harvester Crop (Ex) (Harvester Tiller)
sections.description: Designates up to 3 + Charisma modifier allies as part of a harvester crop who must stay within 30 feet (60 feet at 7th level) to gain benefits from harvester abilities.

sections.title: Swift Sower (Ex) (Harvester Tiller)
sections.description: Increases overland travel speed by +10 feet (+20 feet at 6th level) outside combat, with harvester crop members able to use the better travel speed.

sections.title: Crop Guardian (Ex) (Harvester Tiller)
sections.description: Grants +3 bonus instead of +2 when using aid another on harvester crop members, and stacks harvester tiller levels with vigilante levels for crop vigilance.

sections.title: Scarecrow (Ex) (Harvester Tiller)
sections.description: Provides escalating morale bonuses on attack and damage rolls against creatures threatening attacks of opportunity against harvester crop members.

sections.title: Teamwork Feat (Harvester Tiller)
sections.description: Gains bonus teamwork feats at 2nd, 6th, and 10th levels that must meet normal prerequisites.

sections.title: Sneak Attack (Harvester Tiller)
sections.description: Gains sneak attack damage starting at 1d6 at 3rd level, increasing by 1d6 every 3 levels, stacking with other sneak attack sources.

sections.title: Favored Barn (Ex) (Harvester Tiller)
sections.description: Provides skill bonuses and special benefits within chosen communities, including safe rest locations and untraceable travel.
